Issue.creator: andrew-coleman
Issue.summary: Support contract namespaces in the fabric-network api
Issue.description: : This mangled name would need to be specified as the first param of submitTransaction. This Jira adds the ability to hide this mangling by adding a second optional namespace parameter to the Network.getContract() function. If specified, the Contract instance will hold the namespace and automatically prepend it to the transaction name when submitTransaction() and executeTransaction() are invoked. This aligns the SDK Contract class with the chaincode Contract class. >
